abstract: Venezuela’s government agreed Monday to buy the 28.5 percent stake held by Verizon Communications in Compania Anonima Nacional Telefonos de Venezuela for $572 million. The deal was signed by Jesse Chacon, Venezuela’s telecommunications minister, and John W. Diercksen, Verizon’s executive vice president for strategy and development, on Venezuela’s state television channel.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela’s government agreed Monday to buy the 28.5 percent stake held by Verizon Communications in Compania Anonima Nacional Telefonos de Venezuela for $572 million. The deal was signed by Jesse Chacon, Venezuela’s telecommunications minister, and John W. Diercksen, Verizon’s executive vice president for strategy and development, on Venezuela’s state television channel.
